#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int tc;
cin>>tc;
while(tc--)
{
  int n;
  long long se=0,so=0;
  long long ans=0;
  cin>>n;
  int arr[n],i;
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  {cin>>arr[i];
  if(arr[i]%2==0)
  se++;
  else
  so++;}
  ans+=(se)*(so);
  ans+=(se*(se-1))/2;
  cout<<ans<<endl;
  }
  return 0;
  }
